author: Ajay Gupta
title: Time Representation in Prolog Circuit Modelling

author: Ajay Gupta
title: Clustering short texts using wikipedia
abstract: Subscribers to the popular news or blog feeds (RSS/Atom) often face the problem of information overload as these feed sources usually deliver large number of items periodically. One solution to this problem could be clustering similar items in the feed reader to make the information more manageable for a user. Clustering items at the feed reader end is a challenging
